alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 05 at 9:05AM CDT until April 06 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Less than an inch additional snow accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota and northeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
